Setting.Name: Display All Creatures
Setting.Description: On loot@ notification, show all creatures or only tracked creatures.

Setting.Name: Activate if tracked creature is killed
Setting.Description: Switch the active hunt to this hunt if any of the tracked creatures are killed.

Setting.Name: Always add tracked creature to hunt
Setting.Description: Always add loot from the specified creature to this hunt.

Setting.Name: Save Log To File
Setting.Description: Save the server log of specified hunt to a file.

Setting.Name: Load Log From File
Setting.Description: Import server log data from a file.

Setting.Name: Clear Log
Setting.Description: Clears all loot messages of the specified hunt.

Setting.Name: View Looked At Objects
Setting.Description: When you look at an object, open a notification describing it.

Setting.Name: Copy Advances To Clipboard
Setting.Description: When you advance in level, automatically copy the advance string.

Setting.Name: Popup On Event
Setting.Description: When an event message occurs, show a popup.

Setting.Name: Popup On Unrecognized Command
Setting.Description: When you type in an unknown command, show a popup.

Setting.Name: Scanning Speed
Setting.Description: Modify the scanning speed of Tibialyzer. A faster scanning speed takes more CPU resources, but decreases response time.

Setting.Name: Reset Settings To Default
Setting.Description: Reset all settings to the default settings.

Setting.Name: Popup Type
Setting.Description: Set popups to either simple popups (system messages) or rich popups (fancy popups).

Setting.Name: Popup Items
Setting.Description: Show a popup when any of the specified items drop.

Setting.Name: Popup Condition
Setting.Description: Specify your own conditions on which loot popups should be shown in SQL.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Simple Notification Item Loot Drop Code Program

Setting.Name: Test Popup Message
Setting.Description: Test if a loot message triggers a popup.

Setting.Name: Default Outfit Gender
Setting.Description: Specify the default outfit gender displayed when the outfit@ command is used.

Setting.Name: Notification Placement
Setting.Description: Specify the location at which rich notifications should appear.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Rich Notification Position Screen Location Place Move

Setting.Name: Display Group
Setting.Description: Only one notification can be active per display group. If a new notification appears in the same display group, it overwrites the previous notification.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Rich Notification Position Screen Location Place Move

Setting.Name: Duration
Setting.Description: Specify how long the notification will wait before fading out.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Rich Notification Position Screen Location Place Move Close Exit

Setting.Name: Popup Placement
Setting.Description: Specify the location at which popups appear.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Simple Notification Position Screen Location Place Move

Setting.Name: Enable Popup Animations
Setting.Description: Enable or disable the animations for popups.

Setting.Name: Suspended Window Placement
Setting.Description: Specify the location at which the "Suspended" window appears.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Suspend AutoHotkey Position Screen Location Place Move

Setting.Name: Start Script On Startup
Setting.Description: Automatically start the AutoHotkey script

Setting.Name: Exit Script On Exit
Setting.Description: Close the AutoHotkey script when Tibialyzer exits.

Setting.Name: Download AutoHotkey
Setting.Description: Download the AutoHotkey program from the official website.

Setting.Name: (Re)start AutoHotkey
Setting.Description: Start or restart the AutoHotkey script.

Setting.Name: Shutdown AutoHotkey
Setting.Description: Shutdown the AutoHotkey script.

Setting.Name: Enable Screenshots
Setting.Description: Allow Tibialyzer to automatically take screenshots when certain events happen.

Setting.Name: Screenshot on Skill/Level Advance
Setting.Description: Allow Tibialyzer to take a screenshot when you advance in level or skill.

Setting.Name: Screenshot on Rare Item Drop
Setting.Description: Allow Tibialyzer to take a screenshot when a rare item drops.

Setting.Name: Screenshot on Death
Setting.Description: Allow Tibialyzer to take a screenshot when you die.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Death Killed Destroyed Annihilated Ravaged Buttdevastated Mad Angry

Setting.Name: Select Client
Setting.Description: Selects the Tibia client to scan from a list of all processes.

Setting.Name: Modify Database (Pickup)
Setting.Description: Select which items to pickup and which to discard based on gold/cap ratio.

Setting.Name: Modify Database (Convert)
Setting.Description: Select which items to convert to gold based on gold/cap ratio.

Setting.Name: Command List
Setting.Description: Search the list of Tibialyzer commands.

Setting.Name: Browse Database
Setting.Description: Browse the Tibialyzer database.
Setting.ExtraTerms: Tibia Object Creature Item Spell NPC Hunt Place Hunting Quest Outfit Mount
